Uses of Interface
net.viktorc.pp4j.api.ProcessManagerFactory

  • Packages that use ProcessManagerFactory 
    Package Description
    net.viktorc.pp4j.api  
    net.viktorc.pp4j.impl  

    • Uses of ProcessManagerFactory in net.viktorc.pp4j.api

      Methods in net.viktorc.pp4j.api that return ProcessManagerFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProcessManagerFactory ProcessExecutorService.getProcessManagerFactory()
      Returns the ProcessManagerFactory instance responsible for creating instances of an implementation of the ProcessManager interface for managing the processes of the pool.

    • Uses of ProcessManagerFactory in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl

      Methods in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl that return ProcessManagerFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProcessManagerFactory ProcessPoolExecutor.getProcessManagerFactory() 
      Methods in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl with parameters of type ProcessManagerFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ProcessExecutorService ProcessExecutors.newCachedProcessPool(ProcessManagerFactory managerFactory)
      Returns a pool of processes that grows in size as required.
      static ProcessExecutorService ProcessExecutors.newCustomProcessPool(ProcessManagerFactory managerFactory, int minPoolSize, int maxPoolSize, int reserveSize)
      Returns a pool of processes.
      static ProcessExecutorService ProcessExecutors.newFixedProcessPool(ProcessManagerFactory managerFactory, int size)
      Returns a pool of a fixed number of processes.
      static ProcessExecutorService ProcessExecutors.newSingleProcessPool(ProcessManagerFactory managerFactory)
      Returns a fixed size pool holding a single process.
      Constructors in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl with parameters of type ProcessManagerFactory 
      Constructor and Description
      ProcessPoolExecutor(ProcessManagerFactory procManagerFactory, int minPoolSize, int maxPoolSize, int reserveSize, boolean verbose)
      Constructs a pool of processes.
